column4: Well siretart, I can't ask the Network Admin, he will not allow it
So can I ftp to my Office PC using some ftp software ?
Well I will but I just asked if something could be done to connect to my Office pc from home
that will be good
Well how do I do that ?
siretart's idea should work
what kind of errors?
how do you change res?
I just click>Computer>Screen Resolution
so it's only showing 640x480 in the options?
looks like the 4mb ram is in there
would I be correct in assuming you don't understand the x config file?
how do you change res? just using Computer-Settings->Change Resolution?
are you going back to warty?
this is your test machine and you've been having problems for > 1 week
the problem is that I have to get a CD-ROM from another machine and I don't want to do that
you have another computer with Ubuntu on it?
can I install Ubuntu from FTP ?
I can SSH to the Hoary Machine, can something be done from this Machine to reinstall Ubuntu on the problematic PC ?
I really don't know
it's not x.org
I'm running hoary
